channel.title: Need some help with SCAR, please help me
channel.description:
Hi. im not very good with scar and im trying to learn the basic techniques for scripting. ANYWAY, i have a couple of questions: 1. do my include files have to be saved as '.scar'? Could they still work as '.txt'? 2. i got a guide of scar from kaitniek's site. it says to turn off sun java and turn on microsoft vm. Is this really necessary? if it is, i am using IE7 and i hate it. i am trying to get 6 back...when i go to the advanced tab under internet options there is a place where it says sun java but it doesn't say microsoft vm anywhere.
I *REALLY* need some help here. thanks :)

item.title: Need some help with SCAR, please help me
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

Yeah, Like Weibs said I dont think you need to turn anything off, because I haven’t. =)

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help with SCAR, please help me
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

  1. Your include files can be .scar or .txt.

  2. I never did, and it works fine for me. I don’t think you have to turn off anything.

Hope I helped,

-Weibs.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with SCAR, please help me

item.title: Need some help with SCAR, please help me
item.dc:creator: @kingnick0694 kingnick0694
item.description:
@kingnick0694 wrote:

Hi. im not very good with scar and im trying to learn the basic techniques for scripting. ANYWAY, i have a couple of questions: 1. do my include files have to be saved as ‘.scar’? Could they still work as ‘.txt’?
2. i got a guide of scar from kaitniek’s site. it says to turn off sun java and turn on microsoft vm. Is this really necessary? if it is, i am using IE7 and i hate it. i am trying to get 6 back…when i go to the advanced tab under internet options there is a place where it says sun java but it doesn’t say microsoft vm anywhere.

I REALLY need some help here. thanks
